original_text: So he ran on ahead and climbed up into a sycamore tree to see him, for he was about to pass that way.
korean_text: 앞으로 달려가서 보기 위하여 돌무화과나무에 올라가니 이는 예수께서 그리로 지나가시게 됨이러라

sentences.original_text: and climbed up into a sycamore tree
for he was about to pass that way
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 그 길로 지나가실 것이었기 때문입니다.
